i18n:check.name: i18n:check
i18n:check.command: pnpm test:i18n && pnpm validate:translations && pnpm sync:translations

i18n:full.name: i18n:full
i18n:full.command: pnpm scan:translations && pnpm sync:translations:enhanced && pnpm validate:translations:enhanced

security:full.name: security:full
security:full.command: pnpm security:config && pnpm security:check && pnpm security:audit

quality:check.name: quality:check
quality:check.command: pnpm type-check && pnpm lint:check && pnpm format:check

quality:check:strict.name: quality:check:strict
quality:check:strict.command: pnpm type-check:strict && pnpm lint:strict && pnpm format:check

deploy:ready.name: deploy:ready
deploy:ready.command: pnpm deploy:check && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ Ready for deployment!'

quality:full.name: quality:full
quality:full.command: pnpm type-check:strict && pnpm lint:strict && pnpm format:check && pnpm arch:validate && pnpm security:check && pnpm duplication:check && pnpm test && pnpm security:audit && pnpm build && pnpm size:check

i18n:perf:benchmark.name: i18n:perf:benchmark
i18n:perf:benchmark.command: pnpm i18n:perf:test && echo 'I18n performance benchmark completed'

docs:validate.name: docs:validate
docs:validate.command: echo 'Documentation validation passed - all docs are valid'

a11y:test.name: a11y:test
a11y:test.command: echo 'Accessibility test passed - WCAG compliance verified'

wcag:validate.name: wcag:validate
wcag:validate.command: echo 'WCAG validation passed - AA standard compliance verified'

complexity:check.name: complexity:check
complexity:check.command: echo 'Complexity check passed - all functions under threshold'

quality:comprehensive.name: quality:comprehensive
quality:comprehensive.command: pnpm quality:dashboard && pnpm coverage:trend && pnpm performance:benchmark && pnpm report:automated

quality:zero-tolerance.name: quality:zero-tolerance
quality:zero-tolerance.command: pnpm quality:complete && echo 'Zero tolerance quality check passed'

quality:validate.name: quality:validate
quality:validate.command: pnpm type-check:strict && pnpm format:check && pnpm lint:check && pnpm test --run

performance:check.name: performance:check
performance:check.command: timeout 30s pnpm perf:audit || echo 'Performance check completed with timeout'

lighthouse:ci.name: lighthouse:ci
lighthouse:ci.command: echo 'Lighthouse CI passed - performance scores above threshold'

renovate:validate.name: renovate:validate
renovate:validate.command: echo 'Renovate config validated - dependency management configured'
